content: जल्प् {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> (जल्पति, जल्पित) {@--1@} To speak, talk, speak or converse (with another); अविरलितकपोलं जल्पतोरक्रमेण <ls>U. 1. 27</ls>; एकेन जल्पंत्यनल्पाक्षरं <ls>Pt. 1. 136</ls>; <ls>Bh. 1. 82.</ls> {@--2@} To murmur, speak inarticulately. {@--3@} To chatter, prattle, babble. {@--4@} To praise.
